content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) and transport belt (position (-16.5, -51.5))
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and transport belt (position (-15.5, -51.5))
### Furnace at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of 
-  Furnace (position (-10.0, -49.0))
### Inserter System at position(-13.5, -50.5)
Consists of 
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) and transport belt (position (-14.5, -51.5))
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -48.5)) and transport belt (position (-12.5, -48.5))
### Chest at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of 
-  Wooden chest (position (-16.5, -47.5)) and burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5))
### Belt Group at position(-17.5, -51.5)
Consists of 
-  Belt group with 4 belts (position (-17.5, -51.5) -> (-12.5, -51.5))
### Belt Group at position(-12.5, -46.5)
Consists of 
-  Belt group with 2 belts (position (-12.5, -46.5) -> (-12.5, -49.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel to operate
-  Ensure that the output of the burner mining drill is not blocked by items on the ground
-  Ensure that there is a sink entity in place to accept the output of the burner mining drill
### Errors when using furnace
-  Ensure that the furnace has fuel to operate
### Errors when using inserter
-  Ensure that the inserter has source items to pick up
-  Ensure that the inserter has a valid drop position

### NAMESPACE
*   `current_inventory`: dictionary of current inventory items and their quantities
*   `entities_on_map`: list of entities on the map, including their positions and statuses
*   `burner_mining_drill`: function to create a burner mining drill
*   `furnace`: function to create a furnace
*   `inserter`: function to create an inserter
*   `transport_belt`: function to create a transport belt
*   `belt_group`: function to create a belt group
*   `wooden_chest`: function to create a wooden chest
